definition: classics/sacred book/scripture/to pass through/to undergo/to bear/to endure/warp (textile)/longitude/menstruation/channel (TCM)/abbr. for economics 經濟|经济[jing1 ji4]
to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences

sentences.english: The PKE also has strong longitudinal variation.
sentences.chinese: PKE隨經度也有明顯的變化。

sentences.english: As mentioned above, you must assume that the source table contains latitude and longitude values.
sentences.chinese: 正如上面提到的，必須假設源表包含緯度和經度值。

sentences.english: y So, you use maybe longitude and latitude; that's x and y.
sentences.chinese: 可以使用經度和緯度作爲x和。

sentences.english: What is the latitude and longitude of the N-arrow in the Symphony Lake?
sentences.chinese: 在交響樂湖畔N箭頭所指處的經度和緯度各是多少？

sentences.english: Two river entrances to the sea, one in the east, one in the west, across four longitudes.
sentences.chinese: 兩個入海口，一東一西，跨越四個經度。

sentences.english: Each point on Earth is specified by geographic latitude and longitude.
sentences.chinese: 地球上每一點都可以用地理緯度和經度來確定。

sentences.english: The intercross of latitudes and longitudes, we may slip some points again.
sentences.chinese: 緯度與經度交叉，我們可能一再錯失某個點。

sentences.english: He noted the latitude and longitude, then made a mark on the admiralty chart .
sentences.chinese: 他記下緯度和經度，然後在航海圖上做了個標記。

definition: light-years (apart)/a million miles (apart)/(i.e. indicates a huge difference or a huge distance)
